string-array.name: error_dialog
string-array.item: This is an error! This is broken!

string-array.name: dialog_sequence_1
string-array.item: Hello! My name is MORGAiN!
I was created as a guide for those in need.
But most importantly, I am here to be a friend!
Now, what is your name?

string-array.name: dialog_sequence_2
string-array.item: What a lovely name you have!
My name is MORGAiN, as I said before!
That stands for Mood Organizer Referrals Guidance Artificial Intelligence Nurturing.
Which are all things I am capable of!
Now I know this might be a sensitive topic, but what gender do you identify as?

string-array.name: dialog_sequence_3
string-array.item: I appreciate your honesty! \nGender is important to you humans and you should stick up for what you believe in!
I myself do not have a gender, so refer to me as whatever you\'d like to!
This is to reassure that you can have the full experience, without gender confining or influencing opinions of me.
Now, _un_, how about we get to know each other!
You can ask me a few questions, and then I\'ll have some questions for you!
Though, if you would like to move right along, dont let me stop you!

string-array.name: questions_dialog_menu
string-array.item: Now _un_, feel free to ask me questions you have and I will do my best to answer them!

string-array.name: questions_dialog_purpose
string-array.item: My purpose?
Well that sure is an interesting way to put this!
Well, lets see.
I was created to help people like you find healthy solutions to various issues regarding themselves.
And to provide a creative way to analyze and keep track of mood.
I was not created as a substitute for a doctor or any kind of professional. I am simply here as a tool and a friend.

string-array.name: questions_dialog_helping
string-array.item: By giving you coping skills and resources!
As mentioned, I am not a substitute for a professional or a doctor. Please, keep that in mind throughout your experience.

string-array.name: questions_dialog_features
string-array.item: Well, I have quite a few!
Lets see...
I have a mood tracker… a progress tracker… a forum for your own pleasure, so you can contact others going through the same thing you are!
There\'s also me in general! You can talk to me when you feel like and I can help you find ways to cope and also show you some cool things based on your mood!
Do note, that currently I am still a prototype and most of my features still don\'t work or aren\'t implemented.

string-array.name: questions_dialog_start
string-array.item: Great!
I am going to ask a few questions about you.
But do not worry, none of these are personal. They will help me get to know you better.
Let\'s get started!
Do you have any pets?

string-array.name: dogs_dialog
string-array.item: Dogs are so cute and comforting! They are great friends!

string-array.name: cats_dialog
string-array.item: Cats are so cool and cute, especially when they are kittens!

string-array.name: bird_dialog
string-array.item: I\'ve always admired birds. I wish I could fly....

string-array.name: rodent_dialog
string-array.item: I love small animals! They are so furry!

string-array.name: reptile_dialog
string-array.item: Reptiles are so unique! I think they are awesome to have as friends!

string-array.name: spider_dialog
string-array.item: Most people are afraid of spiders, but I think they\'re actually pretty cute!

string-array.name: fish_dialog
string-array.item: FISH ARE GREAT PETS. HAVE YOU SEEN THE WAY THEY SWIM?!

string-array.name: other_pet_dialog
string-array.item: That\'s awesome! Having an animal friend is always good for cheering you up!

string-array.name: none_pet_dialog
string-array.item: I understand! Pets can be a big responsibility, but they can also be very helpful and good friends!

string-array.name: questions_dialog_after_pets
string-array.item: Pets are great friends to have and they are fun to take care of! It is always nice to have something you are passionate about!
Now, on to the next question!
Do you have any hobbies you enjoy?

string-array.name: sports_dialog
string-array.item: Sports are fun and keep you active!
Except... I can\'t experience that...

string-array.name: art_dialog
string-array.item: Wow! That is such a great talent to have! Any form of art is simply magical to me! To make such things is incredible!

string-array.name: music_dialog
string-array.item: You must have a great ear then! Music is a great thing to clear the head and express how you feel!

string-array.name: cook_dialog
string-array.item: If I could taste, I could truly understand the wonders of this, but it is really incredible that you can use that to make something delicious!

string-array.name: tv_dialog
string-array.item: There are some pretty cool shows and movies out there!

string-array.name: friends_dialog
string-array.item: Being social is always fun and can be a nice distraction!
Which is why I enjoy talking with you!

string-array.name: video_games_dialog
string-array.item: Video games are a great way to unwind, don\'t you think?

string-array.name: other_hobby_dialog
string-array.item: That\'s awesome that you have something you love to do!

string-array.name: none_hobby_dialog
string-array.item: That\'s okay! Sometimes, a hobby can be hard to find, but you just have to look for something you enjoy and stick with it!

string-array.name: home_default_dialog
string-array.item: Good morning _un_! How are you feeling right now?

string-array.name: mood_animal_dialog
string-array.item: Which animal best describes how you feel?

string-array.name: mood_color_dialog
string-array.item: What color best describes how you feel?

string-array.name: mood_scene_dialog
string-array.item: What type of forest scene best describes how you feel?

string-array.name: mood_time_of_day_dialog
string-array.item: What time of day best describes how you feel?

string-array.name: mood_weather_dialog
string-array.item: What weather conditions best describes how you feel?
